overview: This architecture analysis provides a comprehensive overview of the hybrid cloud Azure Local environment, detailing its components, data flows, security considerations, and actionable recommendations for enhancing security posture.

components.name: Control Plane
components.description: Manages Azure services and resources through tools like Azure Portal, Azure CLI, and Azure Policy.
security_considerations: Implement role-based access control (RBAC) to restrict access to sensitive operations.
Regularly audit access logs for unusual activities.
components.data_handling: Manages configuration and state of Azure resources.
components.encryption_status: data at rest and in transit encrypted

components.name: Azure Local Instance
components.description: Hosts traditional, non-containerized applications and virtual machines (Arc VMs) using Hyper-V.
security_considerations: Ensure Hyper-V is updated with the latest security patches.
Use network segmentation to isolate sensitive workloads.
components.data_handling: Processes and stores application data locally.
vulnerabilities: Hyper-V vulnerabilities, unauthorized access to VMs

components.name: Kubernetes-based Applications
components.description: Managed by Azure Kubernetes Service (AKS) enabled by Azure Arc, facilitating container orchestration.
security_considerations: Implement network policies to control traffic between pods.
Use Azure Policy for Kubernetes to enforce compliance.
components.encryption_status: data at rest and in transit encrypted

components.name: Validated Hardware
components.description: Includes Azure Local machines and ToR (Top of Rack) switches for network management.
security_considerations: Ensure hardware is certified and validated for Azure compatibility.
Implement physical security controls to prevent unauthorized access.

components.name: Corp Firewall
components.description: Ensures security by controlling outbound access to required URL endpoints.
security_considerations: Regularly update firewall rules to reflect current security policies.
Monitor firewall logs for suspicious activities.
components.data_handling: Controls traffic flow between internal and external networks.

trust_boundaries.name: On-Premises to Azure Local
recommendations: Use Azure ExpressRoute for dedicated connectivity.
